view

Class ViewFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ViewFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, IView

    public class ViewFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IView, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Runnable

    The Class ViewFacade provides a facade of the View component.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Louis CHOCHOY, Thomas ISAAC, Valentin CASEN and Adrien LALISSE
